subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 101127
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
427 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF TO AFFECT WEST FACING BEACHES OF SOUTHWESTERN
CALIFORNIA...

A STRONG NORTHWEST FLOW WILL BRING A RISE IN SEA CONDITIONS IN
THE COASTAL WATERS THROUGH LATE WEEK. HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF IS
EXPECTED ACROSS WEST-FACING BEACHES FOR LATE WEEK AS AN INCREASE
IN WIND DRIVEN WAVE ENERGY ARRIVES AT THE BEACHES.

CAZ034-035-101600-
/O.NEW.KLOX.SU.Y.0005.070410T1700Z-070411T1000Z/
SAN LUIS OBISPO COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY CENTRAL COAST-
427 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM PDT
WEDNESDAY...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN LOS ANGELES/OXNARD HAS ISSUED A HIGH
SURF ADVISORY...WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 AM
PDT WEDNESDAY.

EIGHT TO TEN FOOT BREAKERS WITH MAXIMUM SETS TO TWELVE FEET CAN BE
EXPECTED TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY ON WEST FACING BEACHES. AS
STRONG WINDS INCREASE ON THURSDAY...BREAKERS ARE EXPECTED TO
INCREASE TO NEAR TWELVE FEET IN THE MOST SUSCEPTIBLE LOCATIONS. WITH
AN INCREASED SOUTHERLY SWELL DEVELOPING AS WELL...A HIGH POTENTIAL
FOR DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS EXISTS FOR ALL WEST FACING BEACHES
THROUGH MUCH OF THE WEEK.

A HIGH SURF ADVISORY MEANS THAT HIGH SURF WILL AFFECT BEACHES IN THE
ADVISORY AREA...PRODUCING RIP CURRENTS AND LOCALIZED BEACH EROSION.
SWIMMING OR SURFING IN THESE WAVES MAY BE DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE.
WHEN IN DOUBT...JUST STAY OUT.

$$

CAZ039>041-101600-
/O.NEW.KLOX.CF.S.0003.070410T1700Z-070411T1000Z/
SANTA BARBARA COUNTY SOUTH COAST-VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
427 AM PDT TUE APR 10 2007

..HIGHER THAN NORMAL SURF EXPECTED FOR LATE WEEK...

FOUR TO SIX FOOT BREAKERS WITH MAXIMUM SETS TO SEVEN FEET CAN BE
EXPECTED LATER TODAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY ON WEST FACING BEACHES.
WITH AN EXPECTED INCREASE IN NORTHWEST FLOW OVER THE COASTAL
WATERS ON THURSDAY...A HIGH SURF ADVISORY MAY BE NECESSARY FOR THE
AREA. WITH AN INCREASED SOUTHERLY SWELL DEVELOPING AS WELL...A
HIGH POTENTIAL FOR DANGEROUS RIP CURRENTS EXISTS FOR ALL WEST
FACING BEACHES THROUGH MUCH OF THE WEEK.

ALL PERSONS SHOULD BE AWARE OF THE RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH WATER
RELATED ACTIVITIES AND USE EXTREME CAUTION WHEN ENTERING THE OCEAN.
STRONG RIP CURRENTS WILL ALSO MAKE SWIMMING OR SURFING IN THESE
LARGE WAVES VERY DANGEROUS FOR ANYONE. WHEN IN DOUBT...JUST STAY
OUT.

$$

MEIER/HALL
